main event: Observers reported seeing two huge red lights making sudden and erratic maneuvers over Bedford, Virginia on March 2, 1967.
interesting points: The lights were observed for approximately 40 minutes,The objects were described as turning into monster-like shapes,The police were alerted, but no unusual activity was recorded on radar,This was the third report of unusual objects in the area,The observer heard a whirring sound and noted a lot of wind during the sighting.
witness description: The witness saw the lights from outside their house and described the objects' maneuvers.
